__TOC__

* Contact: <nowiki>[[Gladstone2]]</nowiki>
* Make: Acer
* Brand: Extensa
* Model: 6602WLMi (or 6600)
* Website: http://global.acer.com/products/notebook/as1690.htm (the Extensa 6600 Series is not listed on any Acer Website, see Model note)
** the european website has sections for all extensa notebooks. For Acer Extensa 6600 see http://support.acer-euro.com/drivers/notebook/ex_6600.html
=== Hardware details ===

* Acer Extensa 6002 WLMi
* Intel Pentium M 1.73GHz
* 512 MB DDR2 Memory
* 80GB HDD 7200 RPM
* DVD/CD-RW Combo Drive
* 15.4" WXGA CrystalBrite TFT LCD (1280x800)
* Intel i915(GM/GMS) Onboard Graphics
* Conexant 56k Modem
* LAN (Broadcom Ethernet NIC 4401 Gigabit Ethernet)
* WLAN (Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 2200BG)
* Windows XP
* PT Keyboard

=== Current Issues ===
* Finding it difficult to connect Wirless. lshw shows device DISABLED (front Wirless button not detected)
* Had to use the i915 fix (https://help.ubuntu.com/community/i915Driver) to set resolution
** Touchpad issues
** It is n(https://help.ubuntu.com/community/i915Driver)ot possible to do double click without using touchpad buttons.
** It is not possible to do drag'n'drop without using touchpad buttons.
** Touchpad scroll up/down left/right does not work. (Left/right seems to paste clipboard, down opens right click menu)
